thread.title: Terryfic!
thread.title_full: Terryfic! - Review of Roger Smith Hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Jean_Luc730
title: Terryfic!
text:
Welcome friendly and warm. Some gifts especting us in the room. The triptich, location + atmosphere + confort which make the stay enjoyable, was just perfect.. Any types of information required was answered properly and wisely. We especially appreciate the traditional touch of the Roger Smith Hotel and its team. Will be back!...
Room Tip: Suite wide and cosy, And this kind of space today is luxury. Arranged with a touch of art and of cul... See more room tips
